description: I. Letter dated 24/09/2009 from Angela Eagle MP regarding pensions. 2 p. II. Pensions - Consultation On Draft Regulations: Workplace Pension Reform - Completing The Picture. 218 p. III. Pensions - Consultation On Draft Guidance - Use Of Default Funds For Wpps And Group Sipps Used For Automatic Enrolment. 22 p. IV. Government Response To The Consultation-The Pensions (Automatic Enrolment) Regulations 2010. 44 p. V. Impact Assessment Of Workplace Pension Reform (Completing The Picture) Regulations 2010. 65 p.
